lead_paragraph: The Port Authority was seen as a key bank of favors to be doled out in return for endorsements, according to testimony by David Wildstein, a former aide to Chris Christie.

headline.print_headline: Bridge Trial Focuses on Christie’s Political Tactics
headline.main: Bridge Trial Focuses on Christie’s Political Tactics

snippet: The Port Authority was seen as a key bank of favors to be doled out in return for endorsements, according to testimony by David Wildstein, a former aide to Chris Christie....
abstract: Testimony from former Port Authority of New York and New Jersey official David Wildstein in trial of Bill Baroni and Bridget Anne Kelly over closing of George Washington Bridge lanes focuses on Christie's short lived-presidential bid; Wildstein says officials in Christie administration used Port Authority resources, ranging from jobs to artifacts from World Trade Center, as assets to be traded for campaign endorsements across country.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
